short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Yet Another News Summary in Khmer. Where news is cellected.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yansik redefines news from many source and summarizes to be a clear, unique, easy to read and manage. It is now built specifically for Mobile interface running on Mobile and Desktop. 

For Desktop, you need to resize the browser window width to less than 600px. Destkop version will be available soon.

Abount navigating, 
Left Menu lists all Article Categories and Settings (settings will be implemented soon which will allow you to save content, define favorite articles, hide red articles or article category you do not want to appear in the list).

Right Menu lists related articles to the current article you are reading. For example, if you are reading an article of Technology News then the it lists all Technology News articles.
